entry.title: Denial is a River
entry.summary:
Author: Izquierd

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,063Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: â€œMaddie thinks â€”â€ Buck trails off, leaving his sentence purposefully incomplete. Eddie looks at Buck, studying his regretful expression, clearly waiting for him to continue. â€œWhat does Maddie think?â€ â€œShe thinksâ€¦ She thinks Iâ€™m in love with you. Which I'm not!â€ The words leave his lips in a frenzy, tumbling out before he can stop them. Buck watches Eddieâ€™s face fall, eyes cast down into his lap, face contorting and brows furrowing in something between sadness and confusion. â€œYouâ€™re not?â€ Buck scoffs, â€œJesus Eddie, is your ego so big that youâ€™re upset I'm not in love with you?â€ â€œDios Buck. No, it's not that, I justâ€¦ If I was gay I'd be in love with you. I dunno.â€ Eddie's eyes dart back and forth, cast downwards towards the table. Buck feels his eyes widen in shock. â€œReally?â€ â€œYeah, of course, youâ€™re my partner. You know I love you,â€ he answers at a volume Buck can barely hear over the commotion of a bar. â€œOh,â€ Buck breathes in lieu of a response. â€œSorry. I made it weird; you donâ€™t need to be in love with me. Thatâ€™s not fair to you.â€ â€œEddiâ€”â€ â€œLet's move on,â€ he responds curtly, leaving little room to argue.

entry.title: put your loving where your mouth is
entry.summary:
Author: folklorestars

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,248Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 8

Summary: â€œNeed one practice kiss for good luck?â€ Buck asked softly, a twinkle sparkling in his eyes. Eddie gaped at him, feigning horror to disguise the actual panic settling behind his ribcage. â€œWas my kiss last time not satisfactory enough?â€ â€œWell,â€ Buck said with a wince, â€œyour date that night flopped, so obviously not.â€ â€œI didnâ€™t even kiss her, Buck!â€ Eddie protested. â€œNot my problem.â€ â€œYouâ€™re so annoying.â€ Eddie inched closer, his hands coming up to seize the front of Buckâ€™s shirt. â€œCâ€™mere.â€ Or; Eddie starts dating again and Buck lets him practice kissing him for good luck

entry.title: lost and found
entry.summary:
Author: madforyou

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,178Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 177

Summary: "Hello?" he says to the clothing rack, and wow, okay, so this is his life now, he's a guy who talks to clothing racks in public, that's who he is, that's what he's doing. "Hi," says the clothing rack again. Buck peers between the hangers to get a better lookâ€”oh. Oh, there's a very small human in there, blinking up at him from inside what appears to be a nest made entirely of women's cardigans. So that's good, he's not losing his mind, that's a relief. "Um," Buck says. "Hi?" The kid has curly hair and big eyes and crutches propped up against the inside of the rack, and he's looking at Buck like Buck is the weird one here, as if Buck is the one who's chosen to make a home inside a department store display instead of living in a house like a normal person. Or,Buck trips over a clothing rack and into a sexuality crisis.

entry.title: I know they're losing (and I'll pay for my place by the ring)
entry.summary:
Author: funnyfeelingbuckley

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,213Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 47

Summary: It started as an outlet, at first. A way to let out his anger in a controlled manner, with a willing opponent who would offer him the pain that he deserved. He felt itchy. Teen pregnancy in a Catholic household had cloaked him with such a thick layer of shame that he needed a way to forget. It was a good thing, he tells himself. It was an honest thing - born out of good intentions. Until it wasn't. - Or Instead of enlisting in the military, Eddie makes money via an underground fight club in Texas. After threats against his family are leveled, Eddie finds a way to Los Angeles with the help of Athena Grant. Now working as private security, he begins working for Evan "Buck" Buckley, an arrogant and hot-headed singer/songwriter who may just give Eddie Diaz a run for his money. Â  title based on I Bet On Losing Dogs by Mitski

entry.title: Yellow means Happy
entry.summary:
Author: peterscrime

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,100Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 39

Summary: June, a traumatized two-year-old girl, has been placed in the care of Buck and Eddie, as they navigate the challenges of welcoming her into their home. The first few days prove difficult as June struggles to adjust to her new surroundings. As June begins to engage more with family life, eating better and allowing Buck and Eddie to provide comfort, a shocking revelation comes to light. June has a twin brother, Jonah, who was separated from her during their removal from their birth parents due to a miscommunication between counties.As the Buckley-Diaz family continues to navigate the complexities of welcoming these now two traumatized children into their lives, they remain steadfast in their commitment to providing a loving, nurturing environment where June and Jonah can heal and thrive. With the twins reunited and the support of their new family, the future holds the promise of a fresh start and the opportunity for June and Jonah to build the strong bond they were once denied.
